document.full_text: former texas governor bill clements, who was the state's first republican governor since reconstruction when he took office in 1979, has died at the age of 94.
document.title: former texas governor bill clements dies at 94
lines_and_colors: former texas governor bill clements, who was the state's first republican governor since reconstruction when he took office in 1979, has died at the age of 94.
